articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Birds are more colourful closer to the equator, study proves - Phys.org
articles.description: When European naturalists traveled to the tropics in the 1800s, they postulated that birds became more colorful closer to the equator—a theory that scientists confirmed on Monday using artificial intelligence technology.

articles.title: EU recognises MySejahtera as equal to its Digital Covid Certificate - Malay Mail

articles.title: Prospective Chelsea owners Ricketts family give European Super League, Stamford Bridge pledge - ESPN
articles.description: The Ricketts family have outlined a list of promises should they buy Chelsea, including rejecting participation in a European Super League.
